mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_professor_course (professor_id, course_id, create_by, create_time) values (#{professorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select professor_id, course_id, create_by, create_time from bu.wq_professor_course
